• Cellulite, an<t0/> <t1/>irregularity<t2/> <t3/>in the<t4/> <t5/>texture<t6/> <t7/>of<t8/> <t9/>the<t10/> <t11/>skin, is caused<t12/> <t13/>by an<t14/> <t15/>uneven<t16/> <t17/>distribution<t18/> <t19/>of<t20/> <t21/>sub- cutaneous fat, compression<t22/> <t23/>of the connective<t24/> <t25/>tissue and poor blood circulation.
